definition: Report of the regions west of Great Tang/travel record of Xuan Zang 玄奘 on his travels to Central Asia and India
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
Great Tang Records on the Western Regions, travel record of Xuan Zang 玄奘[Xuan2 zang4], compiled by 辯機|辩机[Bian4 ji1] in 646
